testcase.name: User can get clusters if list is empty
testcase.system-out:
Steps: When User see clusters ... passed Then Response is "200" ... passed And Response list of list clusters:"[]" ... passed
Captured stdout: URL = http://127.0.0.1:8080/v0.2/6b26f08455ec449ea7a2d3da75339255/clusters response = 200
200 == 200 [] == []

testcase.name: User can create cluster
User can get clusters, if list has only one cluster
testcase.system-out:
Steps: When User see clusters ... passed Then Response is "200" ... passed And Response list of list clusters:"[u'qacluster-1']" ... passed
Captured stdout: URL = http://127.0.0.1:8080/v0.2/6b26f08455ec449ea7a2d3da75339255/clusters response = 200
200 == 200 [u'qacluster-1'] == [u'qacluster-1']

testcase.name: User can create cluster
User can get clusters, if list has two cluster
testcase.system-out:
Steps: When User see clusters ... passed Then Response is "200" ... passed And Response list of list clusters:"[u'qacluster-1', u'qacluster-2']" ... passed
Captured stdout: URL = http://127.0.0.1:8080/v0.2/6b26f08455ec449ea7a2d3da75339255/clusters response = 200
200 == 200 [u'qacluster-1', u'qacluster-2'] == [u'qacluster-1', u'qacluster-2']

testcase.name: User can get cluster by ID
User can create cluster
User can get clusters, if list has three cluster
testcase.system-out:
Steps: When User see clusters ... passed Then Response is "200" ... passed And Response list of list clusters:"[u'qacluster-1', u'qacluster-2', u'qacluster-3']" ... passed
Captured stdout: URL = http://127.0.0.1:8080/v0.2/6b26f08455ec449ea7a2d3da75339255/clusters response = 200
200 == 200 [u'qacluster-1', u'qacluster-2', u'qacluster-3'] == [u'qacluster-1', u'qacluster-2', u'qacluster-3']

testcase.name: User can delete cluster by ID
testcase.system-out:
Steps: When User delete cluster with id: "0" ... passed Then Response is "204" ... passed
Captured stdout: URL = http://127.0.0.1:8080/v0.2/6b26f08455ec449ea7a2d3da75339255/clusters/07ac2ba388d94657b4594a0ac56c71f1 response = 204
204 == 204
